Contributor: Carlson, George, artist.; United States. Army. Engineer Reproduction Plant, publisher.;
Description: Text says that the Motor Transport Corps will train you to be a mechanic and you can earn while your learn. Illustration shows two servicemen in an army tank asking a man nearby if he would like to be a mechanic in the Transport Corps.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Say! young fellow
